channel.title: Learning with Data
channel.description: Website that hosts personal data science projects

item.title: Fantasy Football
item.description: A look at how players in the NFL are performing relative to their fantasy football projections.

item.title: Data Science Resources
item.description: A collection of data science resources including books, online courses, and websites

item.title: Spark DataFrames
item.description: Getting started with Spark using IPython notebook and Spark DataFrames

item.title: Historical NFL Rankings
item.description: Visualize your NFL Team's Historical Offensive and Defensive Rankings

item.title: Logistic Regression and Optimization
item.description: A tutorial on logistic regression and how to learn the weights using optimization.

item.title: Talkpay
item.description: A look at #talkpay and the distribution of incomes.

item.title: Bayes with Continuous Prior
item.description: A tutorial on how to use Bayes Theorem with a continuous prior.

item.title: Introduction to Bayes Theorem
item.description: A brief introduction to Bayes Theorem and how to use it in Python.

item.title: My First D3 Map
item.description: I have always wanted to create a D3 map, so here is my first attempt.

item.title: MIMIC Data
item.description: Learn how to start analyzing a very rich healthcare dataset of Intensive Care Unit patients.

item.title: Python For Data Mining
item.description: Tutorial on how to use Python for data mining

item.title: High School Offensive Tackles
item.description: I take a look at my brother's chances of playing college football.
